channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: My sister is 65. She has $80,000 in bonds and savings, and $2,600 a month in Social Security. Can she retire?
item.description: “She is single and makes $55,000 a year.”

item.title: AstraZeneca to become latest drugmaker to strike deal with Trump. Its stock is down but outperforming the market.
item.description: AstraZeneca looks poised to announce a deal with U.S. President Donald Trump that’s focused on lowering drug prices, in a move that would see the Brit...

item.title: Bond market flashes signs of worry over shutdown-induced economic damage
item.description: More than a week after the U.S. government’s partial shutdown began on Oct. 1, bond-market traders were starting to express a greater degree of concer...

item.title: ‘I can’t stop thinking about money’: I’m struggling with guilt over my $135K in financial mistakes. How do I move on?
item.description: “We aren’t in debt outside of our mortgage, but I feel sick when I think about the money.”

item.title: Morgan Stanley is opening cryptocurrency investments to all clients. Here’s what percentage of your portfolio should be in crypto.
item.description: Morgan Stanley will rely on its automated monitoring processes to make sure clients are not overly exposed to crypto.

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
item.description: U.S. stocks were mostly lower, with the Nasdaq leading declines as makers of AI infrastructure suffered steep falls, many in the double digits. Nvidia...

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat
item.description: Arabica coffee prices hit a record level, as traders digested the withdrawal of President Trump’s threats to impose tariffs and economic sanctions on ...

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.
